author: jvanzyl
msg: o change the assembly so that classworlds is separated from the rest of the uber jar, otherwise everything is jammed in the
MNG-2894 Hiding the use of plexus-utils in the core by rewriting all references
MNG-2897 We have to let Xpp3Dom be in the core in its original form because it is used in plugins. This was a big mistake. In 2.1
the DOM used for plugin configuration must be in the plugin API.
MNG-2894 Check to see if a plugin uses p-u, if it's less then 1.1 bump it up, and if it doesn't specify the give it 1.1. There
are many plugins that aren't specifying a dependency and they blow up and runtime without p-u

author: dandiep
msg: Give each schema a new systemId so that if we have multiple schemas in the same namespace, they don't get clobbered.
